Authors: Johnson TJ, Johnson SJ, Nolan LK.
Title: Complete DNA sequence of a ColBM plasmid from avian pathogenic Escherichia coli suggests that it evolved from closely related ColV virulence plasmids.
Comment: pAPEC-O1-ColBM with ColB/M colicins (cba-cbi and cma-cmi; has still remnants of ColV though (but misses cvaC-cvi); the APEC Col plasmids are very conserved, all are F-type virulence plasmids)

Authors: Johnson TJ, Siek KE, Johnson SJ, Nolan LK.
Title: DNA sequence of a ColV plasmid and prevalence of selected plasmid-encoded virulence genes among avian Escherichia coli strains.
